p: The serum levels of total cholesterol, HDL-cholesterol, triglycerides, aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), creatinine, and urea were determined in an automated Cobas Integra 400 Plus analyzer (Roche ™, Rotkreuz, Switzerland), using specific Roche® reagents. The LDL-cholesterol was calculated by the Friedwald formula [ 44]: LDL cholesterol = total cholesterol − HDL cholesterol − Triglycerides/5.
